r.d: Parser for Resource Description Framework (RDF) Site Summary (RSS) documents.
r.n: QA release: - Fix bug #11815: XML_Parser must be installed manually [doconnor] - Fix bug #15268: tiny bug, not critical, a typo in RSS.php [doconnor] - Fix bug #17007: Wrong PHP license version [cweiske] - Port unit tests to phpunit 3 - Fix Coding Standards - Convert to package.xml v2 - Stabilize after 4 years in beta
